content:
Welcome!


In this study, you will listen to a series of sounds and press keys to enter a response. It will take about 60 mins to finish this experiment.
Please use earphones, earbuds or headphones while completing the task. Please adjust your volume to a comfortable sound level.
You will begin with a questionnaire asking about your listening devices and how noisy your current environment is.
name: LandingWelcome

content: How noisy is your current environment? (1 = Little to no noise, 5 = Very noisy)
name: logistics_noise

content:
Okay! We are about to start the experiment. Below are my final reminders.

(1) Use your keyboard to respond instead of using your mouse.
(2) DON'T THINK. Follow your first intuition to make response ASAP. You cannot get it correct by thinking.
(3) The total time will depend on your response time, so try to respond as correct and fast as possible.
(4) This task is HARD, and thus requires your undivided attention, so please put away your phone or other distractors whlie doing this experiment.

That's all I have for you. Please try your best! Good luck.
name: Instruction_main

content: Congradulations! You've completed the main task. We just have a few important questions to ask you before you go...
name: Instruction_Q

content: What language are you most comfortable with using? Who did you learn it from, and starting at what age? (Please be specific, for example, say Mandarin rather than Chinese; American English rather than English.) Example: American English, parents, starting at birth
name: DomLang

content: What language are you NEXT most comfortable with using? Who did you learn it from, and starting at what age? (Please be specific, for example, say Mandarin rather than Chinese; American English rather than English.) Example: Spanish, grandmother, starting at age 5
name: NonDomLang

content: Please briefly list the language(s) you use in the following situations: at home; in dorm/apartment; while doing math in your head; while thinking; which one you would use for the rest of your life if you could pick just one. Example response: Home: Spanish; Dorm: English; Math: English; Thinking: English; Rest of life: Italian.
name: LangPrefs

content: Please answer these questions for the language you are most comfortable with.
name: DomLangQs

content: Please answer these questions for the language you are most comfortable with.
name: NonDomLangQs

content: Please enter your age in years.
name: Age

content: What did you think the music experiment was about? Did you notice any recurring patterns?
name: debrief1

content: Did you change how you were answering at any time during the study? What did you change?
name: debrief2

content: Any other comments or observations about the study?
name: debrief3

content: Are there any other languages that you speak or understand? Please describe them briefly here. Example: understand Spanish from high school classes, speak a little Hindi with grandmother
name: AnyOtherLang

content: In this session, you will hear either “Ba” or “Pa” sound on each trial. Press F key on the keyboard by your left index finger if you hear “Ba”. Press J key by your right index finger if you hear “Pa”. If you are not sure, please make the best guess as you can.
name: DiscriminationI

content: In this session, you will hear either “Ba” or “Pa” sound on each trial. Press F key on the keyboard by your left index finger if you hear “Pa”. Press J key by your right index finger if you hear “Ba”. If you are not sure, please make the best guess as you can.
name: DiscriminationI_reversekey

content:
Now please read the instruction carefully for the following task. In each trial, you will hear a series of short tones followed by a speech sound. For this task, only pay attention to the speech sound. Your job is to respond whether you heard “Ba” or “Pa”. Press F key on the keyboard by your left index finger if you hear “Ba”. Press J key by your right index finger if you hear “Pa”. If you are not sure, please make the best guess as you can

Let's listen to some examples!
name: MainI

content:
Now please read the instruction carefully for the following task. In each trial, you will hear a series of short tones followed by a speech sound. For this task, only pay attention to the speech sound. Your job is to respond whether you heard “Ba” or “Pa”. Press F key on the keyboard by your left index finger if you hear “Pa”. Press J key by your right index finger if you hear “Ba”. If you are not sure, please make the best guess as you can

Let's listen to some examples!
name: MainI_reversekey

content: Which of the following listening devices are you currently using?
name: logistic_headphone2

content: Please use earphones, earbuds or headphones for this study. Are you using any of them now?
name: logistic_headphone1

content: Do you consider yourself as a monolingual English speaker? e.g. Is English the only language that you can understand and speak?
name: logistic_monoling_Eng
